_meta.purpose: Index of all hypothetical/placeholder artifacts created for development continuation

index_purpose: This index catalogs all hypothetical artifacts created to demonstrate system capabilities and artifact structures for phases that have not yet been reached or for optional artifacts that have not been generated.

intro_evt_phase.purpose: Identify potential bill sponsors and champions
intro_evt_phase.note: Optional intelligence artifact - demonstrates structure for sponsor targeting analysis

comm_evt_phase.purpose: Staff education and committee member briefing materials
comm_evt_phase.note: Required artifact for COMM_EVT phase - demonstrates structure assuming system advancement
Required artifact for COMM_EVT phase - demonstrates structure assuming system advancement

comm_evt_phase.purpose: Tactical options for amendments and modifications
comm_evt_phase.note: Required artifact for COMM_EVT phase - demonstrates structure assuming system advancement

assumptions: Intelligence artifacts (signal scan, stakeholder map) are available
Optional agent (sponsor targeting) could be spawned
System has advanced to COMM_EVT phase (hypothetical)
Committee referral external event has been confirmed (hypothetical)
INTRO_FRAME and INTRO_WHITEPAPER have been approved via HR_PRE (hypothetical)
comm_evt_artifacts.note: These artifacts represent what would be generated when system reaches COMM_EVT phase

usage_guidance.for_development: These artifacts demonstrate expected structure and content for future phases
usage_guidance.for_planning: Use these artifacts to understand what will be required in future phases
usage_guidance.for_agents: Agents can reference these structures when generating actual artifacts
usage_guidance.for_review: Review templates can reference these structures to understand expected content
limitations: All content is fictional and for demonstration only
Actual artifacts will contain real data and analysis
Structures may evolve based on actual requirements
Member names, scores, and recommendations are placeholders

governance_compliance.compliance_note: These artifacts are informational placeholders only. They do not affect system state, trigger reviews, or authorize any actions.

state_advancement.verification: No artifacts advance legislative state. System remains in INTRO_EVT. COMM_EVT is NOT active.

review_gate_satisfaction.verification: No artifacts satisfy review gates. HR_PRE remains APPROVED (for PRE_CONCEPT only). HR_LANG remains NOT_STARTED.

execution_authorization.verification: No artifacts authorize execution. execution_outreach_comm_evt remains BLOCKED.

real_data_usage.verification: No real actors, committees, bill numbers, member names, or dates are used. All content is fictional.

committee_referral_assumption.verification: No artifacts assume committee_referral has occurred. Committee referral remains PENDING.

system_modification.verification: No artifacts modify agent-registry.json, hr_*_queue.json files, or legislative-state.json.

system_readiness.verification: These artifacts do NOT represent system readiness for COMM_EVT. System is NOT ready for COMM_EVT.

authorization_implication.verification: These artifacts do NOT imply authorization for any actions, state transitions, or agent spawning.

disclaimer: All artifacts in this index are HYPOTHETICAL and SPECULATIVE. They are placeholders created for development continuation purposes. They do not represent actual system state, real data, or authorized actions. All content is fictional and for demonstration purposes only. This artifact is fictional and for development reference only. It does not represent real data, authorized actions, or system state.
